mapper.select: SELECT priv.code FROM APP_PBE.TE_PRIVILEGES priv JOIN APP_PBE.TE_PRIV_IN_ROLES priv_role ON priv.code = priv_role.te_priv_code JOIN APP_PBE.TE_ROLES role ON priv_role.te_role_code = role.code JOIN APP_PBE.TI_USER_IN_ROLES usr_role ON role.code = usr_role.te_role_code JOIN APP_PBE.TRAINING_INSTITUTION_USERS usr ON usr_role.ti_user_id = usr.id WHERE usr.login = #{login}

SELECT priv.code FROM APP_PBE.TE_PRIVILEGES priv JOIN APP_PBE.TE_PRIV_IN_ROLES priv_role ON priv.code = priv_role.te_priv_code JOIN APP_PBE.TE_ROLES role ON priv_role.te_role_code = role.code JOIN APP_PBE.TE_IND_USER_IN_ROLES usr_role ON role.code = usr_role.te_role_code JOIN APP_PBE.INDIVIDUAL_USERS usr ON usr_role.inu_id = usr.inu_id JOIN APP_PBE.INDIVIDUALS ind ON ind.id = usr.ind_id WHERE ind.pesel = #{pesel}

SELECT usr.inu_id inuId, ind.id indId, ind.pesel pesel, usr.verification_code verificationCode, usr.is_active active, usr.LAST_LOGIN_SUCCESS_DATE lastLoginSuccessDate, usr.LAST_LOGIN_FAILURE_DATE lastLoginFailureDate, usr.LOGIN_FAILURE_ATTEMPTS loginFailureAttempts, usr.LAST_RESET_FAILURE_DATE lastResetFailureDate, usr.RESET_FAILURE_ATTEMPTS resetFailureAttempts, usr.VERSION version, usr.CREATED_USER createdUser, usr.CREATED_TIMESTAMP createdTimestamp, usr.MODIFIED_USER modifiedUser, usr.MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP modifiedTimestamp FROM APP_PBE.INDIVIDUAL_USERS usr JOIN APP_PBE.INDIVIDUALS ind ON ind.id = usr.ind_id WHERE ind.pesel = #{pesel}
SELECT role.CODE code, role.DESCRIPTION description, role.CONTEXT context FROM APP_PBE.TE_ROLES role WHERE role.CONTEXT = #{criteria.config.tiUserContext}
SELECT role.CODE code, role.DESCRIPTION description, role.CONTEXT context FROM APP_PBE.TE_ROLES role WHERE role.CONTEXT = #{criteria.config.indUserContext}

SELECT role.CODE code, role.DESCRIPTION description, role.CONTEXT context FROM APP_PBE.TE_ROLES role INNER JOIN APP_PBE.TE_IND_USER_IN_ROLES urole ON role.code = urole.TE_ROLE_CODE WHERE urole.INU_ID = #{individualUserId}
SELECT ti_user.TRAINING_ISTITUTION_ID FROM APP_PBE.TRAINING_INSTITUTION_USERS ti_user WHERE ti_user.LOGIN = #{tiUserLogin}
